definitions.text: supernatural forces and events and beings collectively
examples: She doesn't believe in the supernatural
he is a student of the occult

definitions.text: cause an eclipse of (a celestial body) by intervention
examples: The Sun eclipses the moon today
Planets and stars often are occulted by other celestial bodies

definitions.text: become concealed or hidden from view or have its light extinguished
examples: The beam of light occults every so often
The lids were occulting her eyes

definitions.text: having an import not apparent to the senses nor obvious to the intelligence; beyond ordinary understanding
examples: the secret learning of the ancients
